original_title: 単身赴任の僕の所へ遊びに来た義娘二人にママの代わりと痴女られ続けた二日間。

title: My Slutty Stepdaughters Came To Visit And Do Their Mother’s Part While I Was Working Away From Home, Starring Lala Kudo and Rina Takase
